WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). buyBackDrf(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: can only be called by buy back role

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

operateTraderBalance(uint8,address,int25.details: can only be called fee role

operateTradingFee(uint256,address,addres.details: can only be called fee role

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

removeTrader(address).details: can only be called by DerifyClearing

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferPoolFrom(uint8,uint8,uint8,uint2.details: can only be called by DerifyClearing

BUYBACK_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the buy back role

CLEARING_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the clearing role

FEE_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the fee role

PAUSER_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the pauser role

REWARD_ROLE.details: Create a new role identifier for the reward role

TOKEN_DECIMAL_DIFF.details: The token contract decimals diff with contract decimals

BuyBackDrfUpdate(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Emitted when buy back drf called

InfurancePoolUpdate(uint8,int256,uint256.notice: Emitted when insurance pool balance update

LiquidityPoolUpdate(uint8,int256,uint256.notice: Emitted when liquidity pool balance update

cancelAllOrderedPositions().notice: Close all ordered positions of trader

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit from wallet to contract account

exchangeBondByInsuranceFund(address,uint.notice: Exchange Bond by insurance fund balance

getCloseUpperBound(address,address,uint8.notice: Get the close upper bound of trader

getSysCloseUpperBound(address,uint8).notice: Get the system close upper bound

getSysExchangeBondSizeUpperBound().notice: Get system exchange bond size upper bound

getSysOpenUpperBound(address,uint8).notice: Get the system open upper bound

getSysTotalPositionAmount().notice: Get the total position amount of the whole system

getTraderOpenUpperBound(address,address,.notice: Get the trader's open upper bound

getTraderPositionVariables(uint8,uint256.notice: Get the trader position variables for held position

getTraderVariables(address).notice: Get trader share variables for held position

openPosition(address,address,uint8,uint8.notice: Open position or Ordered limit price position

totalAccountBalance().notice: Get total account balance for all traders

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw from contract account to wallet
